trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There was one other sighting in Edmonton on or around November 28th 2013
Summary: Very very bright object very lowxto south horizon moving east to west ...thought it was the comet that was being chewed up by the sun , but it was destroyed around noon time ? The i.s.s is the only object observec this bright in sky not here till 5 A.M
divs: Sighting DetailsVery bright object low to ground moving from east to west very slowly , grabbed my binoculars 12by 50 s was just round very bright , thought it must be comet , drove about one mile to get my wife observed it on way but was gone when i got there ? Not sure what it was , i know it was not an aircraft seemed to have the brightness of the iss but dont think it was near us at that time ? And moving the speed of celestial bodies in space eg. Moon
